title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include the description that the binding of a noncompetitive inhibitor changes the conformation/shape/structure of the enzyme/active site.
The response includes the description that the binding of a noncompetitive inhibitor changes the conformation/shape/structure of the enzyme/active site.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable explanation. Acceptable explanations include the following.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include a representation that shows an unchanged active site and a modified allosteric site that is not compatible with the regulators.
The response includes a representation that shows an unchanged active site and a modified allosteric site that is not compatible with the regulators.
